thread.title: Sia Asks Kanye to Go Fur-Free
thread.title_full: Sia Asks Kanye to Go Fur-Free

author: Sheldon Pearce
title: Sia Asks Kanye to Go Fur-Free
text:
Sia Asks Kanye to Go Fur-Free Just in time for the Yeezy Season 5 show Kanye (Frazer Harrison/Getty Images for Surface Magazine), Sia (Tyler Golden/NBC/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images) 
As Kanye West was debuting his new fashion line at his Yeezy Season 5 show today, Sia took the opportunity to try and convince him to give up fur. ‚ÄúDear @kanyewest would you consider going fur free?‚Äù she tweeted. ‚ÄúThis is the reality of fur for fashion - it‚Äôs so sad,‚Äù adding a YouTube video called ‚ÄúUnder the Fur Coats: Rabbits‚Äô Screams of Death.‚Äù The new Yeezy Season 5 line includes what appear to be several large fur coats and some fur accessories . 
This isn‚Äôt the first time the singer has challenged another celebrity in defense of animals. Last June, Sia made the same plea to Kim Kardashian on Twitter with the same video. In December, after Azealia Banks posted a video cleaning out a wardrobe covered in what appeared to be chicken remains, Sia tweeted , ‚ÄúSacrificing animals for your gain is the wackest shit I've ever heard. Get ahead by being awesome, kind and working hard.‚Äù Dear @kanyewest would you consider going fur free? This is the reality of fur for fashion - it's so sad üò∞ https://t.co/fdUhN78nlg
